page.title: 12Mains Services
page.content: Childs Ercall has mains water which is piped to the village it is suppled by {Severn Trent Water}authority,the water is stored underground in three storage tanks with corrugated iron roofs over like covers and there are pipes around the village. We have electricity which is supplied by the{Midlands Electricity Board. The North sea Gas main passes along our area but the cost of connecting it to the village is too high. We have a sewage plant in Childs Ercall. Most rural areas have septic drainage which is maintained by the householder. The sewage system in Childs Ercall was put in during the second world war to cater for the large number of service men living in the village.
